reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical that this broom & pan would be anything special but I was wrong. The broom is very dense with bristles & it picks up everything; and the pan really does work to quickly clean the bristles & empty the dirt into the pan. Frankly I like it more than the vacuum cleaner cuz much less hassle to use. In fact we bought a second one — for the garage & outside. It’s well-made & packaged. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweeping up made easy
reviews.reviewText: Good broom and dustpan...Easy to assemble ... Works well while standing, as I can't bend down to hold a dustpan when sweeping up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the narrow width of the broom is a significant drawback
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Broom and Dustpan Combo, and while it was a decent product overall, I had one major issue with it. The broom was not wide enough to effectively sweep large areas.On the positive side, the broom and dustpan combo was easy to use and assemble. The broom had sturdy bristles that effectively swept up dirt and debris, and the dustpan had a rubber lip that prevented dust and dirt from escaping. Additionally, the set was compact and easy to store, making it a great option for small spaces.However, I found the narrow width of the broom to be a significant drawback. When sweeping large areas, I had to make several passes to cover the same ground, which was time-consuming and inefficient. Additionally, the broom handle was a bit shorter than I would have preferred, which made it somewhat uncomfortable to use for extended periods.Overall, while I found the Broom and Dustpan Combo to be a decent product, the narrow width of the broom was a significant drawback. If you have a small space and only need to sweep up small areas, this product may work well for you. However, if you have a larger space to clean, you may want to consider a wider broom or a different product altogether

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, the perfect broom and dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: It was time that common household items were improved. I had a broom with vinyl bristles where the bristles fanned out and didn't sweep well anymore. The bristles on this broom get into the corners of my kitchen cupboards well, as well as being close enough together to get the fine dirt. And the handle on the dustpan is long enough for the user to remain standing as the dirt is swept into the dustpan. The dustpan has teeth on the top edge to pull off any hair or threads from the bristles when necessary, and the dustpan is easy to empty into a wastebasket. The broom and dustpan can be clamped together which makes it easy to find them. And the dustpan can be made to hang flat in a broom closet. Both are lightweight and sturdy. I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing reminded me of my college stint as an undercover janitor! You can clean up large or small spills wet or dry, dump it out, give it a rinse, slide the broom into the dustpan, clip them together and hang them out of the way. Very lightweight and functional. Good deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase but it cracked
reviews.reviewText: This works well but the dust pan part cracked within days so I’m a bit unhappy with the look of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a certain well-known but more expensive brand of small hand-held broom, and have major buyer's remorse. It is sturdy and well-constructed, but it's HEAVY. If you plan to use this where you walk around the house and pick up bits, the hand holding the broom may quickly fatigue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a long hair cat so when her hair would clump in a normal broom, I would have to clean it with my hands. Now, I just use the teeth on the dust pan and it’s great! It works so well on getting out hair caught in the bristles.One thing I learned is that if you gently sweep dirt into the pan it works better than if you aggressively sweep it in.Color is true to the picture! Very easy to put together.

Lo compre para barrer mi cochera de hojas que caen y poder levantarlas rápidamente con el recogedor, pero este resultó más eficaz ya que sirve de pequeño depósito para acumular lo de varios días. La calidad me pereció razonable por el precio que pagué, la escoba en un poco angosta en su cepillo pero cumple a la perfección su objetivo.

reviews.reviewerName: Ontario Canada Client ReviewOntario Canada Client Review
reviews.reviewTitle: Love This. Best dust pan and broom - stores well
reviews.reviewText: I had the oxo dust pan ordered off Amazon it’s white with a rubber edge. I realize after using this one, it’s way better without that rubber edge. It’s stores perfectly between my fridge snd freezer I don’t have to move back the dustpan snd try sweeping again like I did the OXO. This one is way better. One shot and it’s all in.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect if you have trouble bending over to fill the dustpan.
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product. I have a bad back making it almost impossible to bend down. This product makes it easy to be just as thorough as when I could hold the dustpan in my hand while I swept up. As well, the attached rake is great for removing any stuck dog hair from sticking to the broom. The fact that the dust pan flips up, holding the dirt securely until you dump it, is an extra bonus. Wish I had found this product years ago.

reviews.reviewTitle: good design of dustpan to keep home clean from acidental spills and hair
reviews.reviewText: Its combing dust pan is great for hair and fibres on floors with ease and design of pan is good so even fine dust also gets collected wothout much effort... even children who are reluctant of cleaning work do cleaning with this happily, my daughter has started taking interest in dusting/cleaning after we brought this... else with traditional broom she hated cleaning work. this is best contribution of this dustpan.Since you can keep collecting garbage in dustpan there is no need to switch off fans and do entire cleaning in one go.. u can sweep small small areas and work in parts and rsst in between without sweating and spoiling hands...only thing is that weight of broom is bit tiring, and can be reduced. and since most of online products are folding ... the joints open while using.. so company needs to work on this and length of broom can be increased for better experience.. looking at quality the product is over priced.. still its highly recommended if u have lot of spills and hair fall
